title: APNewsBreak: Government probe concludes EPA missed chance to prevent Colorado mine spill
text:
APNewsBreak: Government probe concludes EPA missed chance to prevent Colorado mine spill By - Associated Press - Thursday, October 22, 2015 
BILLINGS, Mont. (AP) - APNewsBreak: Government probe concludes EPA missed chance to prevent Colorado mine spill.
